ygData.messageBody:
i believe its eq.castersrealm.com- this one used to be an enchanter site
(they are the originators of the jewelry lists!) and expanded due to
popularity. they also have fequently updated spell lists, as well as
postings on each spell (so you can get quick opinions on a spell's
usefulness)

belphenor
